title: I am writing to kindly request information regarding the budget allocation for taxi/private hire licensing

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I am writing to kindly request information regarding the budget allocation for taxi/private hire licensing over the past three years. Specifically, I would like to ascertain the total budget for each year and determine whether the funding was entirely derived from licensing fees. Additionally, I am interested in knowing the amount of funds allocated in excess of licensing fees, if any.
To assist you in providing the requested information, I have outlined below the specific details I am seeking:
1. Total Taxi/Private Hire Licensing Budget:
Financial Year 1: [Year] - [Amount]
Financial Year 2: [Year] - [Amount]
Financial Year 3: [Year] - [Amount]
2. Funding Sources:
Were the licensing fees the sole source of funding for the taxi/private hire licensing budget in each of the aforementioned years? If not, please specify the additional funding sources.
3. Excess Funding:
If the budget exceeded the revenue generated from licensing fees, kindly provide the amount of funds added in excess of the licensing fees in each year.
I understand that you may require some time to gather the requested information. However, I kindly request that you provide the data within 20 working days from the date of this request. If there are any concerns or obstacles that may hinder the retrieval of this information, I would greatly appreciate your assistance and guidance in overcoming them.
4. Recovery of Excess Funds:
In the event that funds were allocated in excess of the licensing fees in any of the specified years, I kindly request information on whether these excess funds were recovered or carried over to the subsequent year's budget. If there was a recovery process, please provide details on how it was executed.
Please feel free to reach out to me here if you require any further clarification or if there are any specific procedures I need to follow to obtain this information. I sincerely thank you in advance for your attention to this matter and your cooperation.
Yours faithfully,
MR Kenny
